definitionGroups.group: Any of several species of birds, the males having a brilliant patch of metallic red on the throat.

entries.meaning: Two species of genus Calliope (syn. Luscinia), Calliope calliope, the Siberian rubythroat, and Calliope pectoralis, the white-tailed rubythroat.
Rubigula dispar (syn. Pycnonotus dispar), the ruby-throated bulbul.
